channel.title: Dced every 15 Seconds from ALL servers
channel.description:
I know it has something to do with my wireless router because i hooked it up direct to the modem and it's fine, if only I could keep it there but I cant. My router works fine and I'm hooked up lan to it but whenever I connect to any mopar server I can do everything just fine but get disconnected after about 15-20 seconds. Short lapse in connection thats just long enough to dc me? It's not a firewall or anything because that's disabled on the router. My pc has no firewall so that's not it either. The same thing happens with internet downloads, I have to keep pausing and resuming them every 30 seconds.
I just got internet from Charter today and hooked it all up. I have a belkin router. I don't know what info could be useful since it's not a pc issue so if you need any info just ask.
Update: It's definatly a router issue because it's ending songs on pandora halfway through and skipping to another one on my phone thats connected to wifi.
I live in an apartment complex btw, I have the router on a seperate channel than everything i've found on inSSIDer so it shouldn't be interferance..
